title: Foggy city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: A red car drives on a foggy city street with multiple braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (customWeather). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The red car is driving on a foggy city street with multiple braking events. The road is wet and there are other cars on the road. The traffic light is red and there is a parked truck on the side of the road.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a foggy city street with multiple braking events. The driver is being cautious due to the low visibility and wet road conditions.
